website_summaries.verdict: A classic look that serves its purpose for a great price.
pros: A smart purchase for those in need of bathroom space and who are on a budget
Customers note this unit is sturdy and easy to put together
Perfect for dorm rooms and other compact spaces
cons: Can look outdated in some bathrooms, however it's built for function and not necessarily aesthetics

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this little bathroom shelf
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this little bathroom shelf. It was easy to put together and is fairly sturdy. It fits quite a bit of stuff and I love the hand towel bar. Works great for tiny bathroom living! If you found my review helpful, please click Yes below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Just as described, good shelf
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelf for my condo bathroom, it fits well without overwhelming the bathroom. It isnt the best quality shelf- but it is sturdy and serves its purpose. You really cant beat it for the price. Assembly was easy, I had it on the wall in 25 minutes. Downfall is the wire shelves, you cannot hold a lot of small toiletries and the shelves have a piece of wire in the middle so you cannot have something balance on it. I would recommend this for condos/apartments- maybe not something you'd want to display forever.
customer_reviews.author: Boomg

customer_reviews.title: My daughter did not like it and says" it is an ugly"
customer_reviews.text: It is Ok bashroom shelf for the money. My daughter did not like it and says" it is an ugly". But , I like it, Easy to put together, easy to attach to the wall with simple tools everybody have at home. The only conser is that it might work for big bathrooms items as : large size shampoo, conditioner...etc....otherwise the small items would be " unstable " on the shelves. So, what I did, I cut a small pieces of wood that I found in my place, and put it on the top of each shelf. Now I have room for big and small items without worrying they might fell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not experienced in assembling and mounting things but I had a very easy time with this. I love the look of it, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: selena

customer_reviews.title: Easy shelf to assemble and holds all your natural hair products
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my half bathroom in my master bedroom. I needed a place to store all my natural products so I could get to them easily. It was easy to put together and all my products could fit on there so I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: c walker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to install rack.
customer_reviews.text: Easily put together looks beautiful I'm very satisfied and happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: CarolJ15455

customer_reviews.title: Beautifuly useful
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start.. honestly I wish I would of found this about two years ago. It’s a good size, not to heavy, looks stylish, can hold towels when actually drilled into a wall. I’m shortly renting a apartment and didn’t want to place holes, only reason. It’s good metal so I can tell it will last me some good years. Holds up against steam from the shower which is amazing since most things rust. Not this bad boy. I would recommend this, heck I’d even say give it to someone as a gift. It’s easy and quick to build and install. I believe it was about 5 min to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy shelf
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Priced right. I hate spending a lot on these shelves for bathroom. Even with exhaust fans these metal shelves always get some rust, so if it does after a couple years get a new one. Some mentioned they didn't like the dowels cause stuff doesn't sit nice. True but for the little things I just use cute little basket/containers. Seems sturdy enough. Doesn't look cheap. I have a small bathroom and this fits in just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get my little bottles away from the hands of my kids and that shelf is perfect for the job. It looks nice, I lined it with silicone liner so the bottles won’t fall and tadddaaa!!
customer_reviews.author: vera

customer_reviews.title: Wow amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wow I didn’t know what to expect but for this price, you get more than what you pay for! Super sturdy, easy to assemble. Looks great and simple! I purchased one for my master bathroom to hold our towels and one for my downstairs guest bathroom which I use everyday to do my make up and stuff. The only thing I would say is to use your own anchors because the once that it comes with are super crappy. I used thicker ones and my shelf is super sturdy
customer_reviews.author: AKM

customer_reviews.title: So Great I Ordered it Twice
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my basement to hold my dog's towels and soaps next to the sink. It looks great and it's sturdy. This is actually my second one of these. I purchased the first one for my previous house and I needed another one for my new house. Both worked great and because the first one was a success, I ordered again.
customer_reviews.author: bvdew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shelves!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my bathroom. My bathroom is small and I needed to add vertical storage for all my bath and body products and my skin care products. Instant upgrade. No more clutter. They were very simple to put together I put them together myself. 30 minutes to assemble both and about 20 minutes to instal. I would purchase again and they are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small Bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for. The size of this shelf was perfect for my small bathroom to eliminate counter clutter. The durability and stability is way better than I was anticipating. We had no problem installing this on the wall. I would recommend purchasing shelf liners because smaller bottles (perfume, etc.) don't stay upright easily.
customer_reviews.author: scasey

customer_reviews.title: If I need another one I would not hesitate, it’s pretty, Dorabal  no problem at all , a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I have a counter in my bathroom ,just filled with all kinds of medical products, so much I had a problem trying to find thing I needed at the time , well ,I have to say this little two shelf open cabinet,is so easy to put together, has it’s own beauty,has saved me so much time finding the things I need at the time , I’m so happy that I bought it it stands on my counter against the wall, I did not hang it on the wall because I thought it was not necessary, I like it the way it is , fits just everything big and small
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Guest hall powder room is narrow; needed a rack that would not stick out too far yet could hold a few essentials. Brushed silver color matched faucets and existing towel bar exactly and rack is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Maestri

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to add hand towel organization and a towel bar my kids' bathroom. It was really easy to put together...took about 10 minutes and seems sturdy. It's light and easy to mount on the wall but could also be used freestanding. My one any only complaint is about the drywall anchors. They are the flimsiest ones I've ever seen....super thin plastic and bend easily when pushing them into the hole. That said, it's not a big enough complaint to take off a star and I did make them work (I didn't want to go buy any, delaying the installation). Do yourself a favor and buy a pack of sturdier drywall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: April Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was easy to assemble and was just the size that I needed for my bathroom. The cost was great and I am so thankful to have just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Good product generally, but I have two issues: 1. The caps that go into the ends of the frame are bright chrome plastic, which looks silly on a polished nickel frame. 2. The product I received didn’t have one of the holes for screws completely punched out, so I had to use pliers to finish the job, and in the process took off some of the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jake K.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, looks nice and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I needed more shelve space in my bathroom and this worked out pretty good. I have had this for a while now and so far it’s been pretty durable. It was easy to put together and easy to put up on the wall. I would recommend this for anyone needing more space in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and good value.
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, size is generous to put folded fresh bathroom towels on and the hanging towel rod is good too. It’s well enough made and a good value for the price. Easy to assemble too. Unfortunately it makes my small bathroom appear too crowded now so unfortunately I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth  A Norton

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: bought for a small restroom and it was bigger then expected but very happy with the space, very easy to assemble and the metal isn't cheap, fits perfectly in the restroom and has so much room to put out.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Cadenas

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Nice little shelf for little money. Sturdy enough to hold miscellaneous bathroom items. The shelves are not solid, so small items must be put in a container, or will fall through the shelf, but that isn't a problem. Perfect for hand towels and washcloths, and spare toilet paper roll.
customer_reviews.author: DKL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but...
customer_reviews.text: ...get help installing! This shelf is fairly straight forward and very easy to assemble. It's just a tad awkward to hang on your own. It's anchored by 4 screws and plastic anchors. Make sure to measure twice! Nothing worse than an uneven shelf! It's perfect if you have a small bathroom, like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Mile Hi Dave

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this and this is how it showed up. It was bent so bad it was way beyond fixing. Will be returning and won’t be buying another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: laci hall

customer_reviews.title: Really Big
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to put next to the sink. It juts out very far, maybe like 10 in? This should go over the toilet for towels and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf
customer_reviews.text: Meets my needs for the bathroom. A bit difficult to wall mount because the fixture has to be placed on the wall and then the screws put in, needed a second pair of hands to help. Also, lotion/body spray bottles tip over horribly because of the wire shelving so need shelf covers. Besides that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but the design is not quite perfect
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good quality product and was easy to install. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that the towel hanging bar is recessed from the front legs so overall the front legs look sort of odd
customer_reviews.author: J Books

customer_reviews.title: Good shelf
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very sturdy shelf. It was easy to put together as well. I just use it to hold extra toilet paper and wipes. I didn't want a huge over the toilet shelf and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this. i ordered 2 since they were only $13 - you just can’t beat that price. it’s easy to assemble. just make sure the shelves are the right direction before you hang or else you’ll end up with a wire divider on top lol. but they’re very sturdy, durable and allowed me to get some more counter space back in my bathroom. absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Arrived missing all 14 screws needed to be put together as well as the towel bar. Not worth the hassle of putting it back in the box and shipping it for a replacement/refund. Decided to go out and buy the screws to put it together. I can live without the towel bar I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Lizama

customer_reviews.title: we love this product
customer_reviews.text: we love this product. originally purchased one but it worked so nicely, we put it in our other bathroom too. Easy to install. Big enough for big bath towels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon3Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little shelf
customer_reviews.text: Nice little shelf which I mounted just over the toilet. Works well for storage of hair brushes, deodorant etc. I bought a couple baskets to hold the smaller stuff that would fall through the grates
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D.

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in the restroom of the car dealership i am employed with. So far, it's held up great and since it's attached to the wall nicely, it's not been stolen! Looks great and adds to the aesthetics!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Scratched and rusty on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with metal all scratched and rusted. Need to return
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small bathroom stand
customer_reviews.text: I have had this stand for a year now and it’s still great quality. The silver is as beautiful as it was when I opened to box. I have it sitting in between my his and hers sinks and it looks perfect. It’s sturdy and a wonderful addition to my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the price. I can hold 4 full size bath towels (folded in thirds) on the bottom shelf and hand towels and rags on the top. Great for our tiny guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and larger than expected. I opted for this type of storage because the bathroom it's going in is so small that an over the toilet shelf wouldnt have worked without hitting the toilet paper holder. This one is the perfect size to still fit in the wall space above the toilet without feeling like you're taking up any space.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Loendorf

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a shelf for my bathroom to clear up counter space and this did the job perfectly. It took about 15 minutes to assemble and hang. Seems sturdy at least for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: ambival3nt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Durable and clean looking. Very nice and cute in tight spaces which is great.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON

customer_reviews.title: No screws at all
customer_reviews.text: This came with no screws!! I waited a week when it could have came 2 or 3 days after since i have prime but i cannot believe that i was overly excited for this because of the reviews and us needing room badly in our home and now i cannot set it up because there are no screws at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my tiny apartment bathroom and I love it. My only issue was after a few weeks the caps at the bottom of the legs started to fall off but you cant really see them so its not a huge issue. Other than that It works perfectly and looks very sleek. It almost reminds me of something you would see in a hotel. It's definitely not for heavy objects but for other bathroom essentials like your makeup, toothbrushes, and hygiene products its very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I chose to leave mine on the floor because I already have things on the wall but overall I’m happy with my purchase! I recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Chandana

customer_reviews.title: Great Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the quality for the rack/shelf was better then expected. It’s sturdy and hopefully won’t rust. It conveniently holds towels and toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Welds are sloppy
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but definitely not great quality. The welds are sloppy. Once you secure it to the wall it is pretty sturdy. For a 2nd bathroom it is ok, but I wouldn't put this in a main/remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: RooRoo

customer_reviews.title: Wonky?
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pre-fab holes didnt line up quite right so it was a struggle to get everythung together. It's also not perfectly straight, but it works and holds stuff, so 4/5 for being slightly bent.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Marie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, not great for storing common toiletries
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but the screw anchors it comes with are flimsy garbage and we ended up having to use sturdier ones we happened to have lying around or else we wouldn't have been able to mount it. The wires are flimsy and annoyingly far apart such that the most common items you'd want to store (deodorant, combs, etc) have a tendency to slide through or tip over. You're better off finding a sturdier one at a hardware store or something.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great shelf for the price. Pieces bend easily and the towel rod was a bit misshapen but it serves its purpose and looks a lot nicer than the price would suggest
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garrison

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product is the perfect size for our bathroom, seems very sturdy. Easy to assemble and install. However I was a disappointed that several pieces had rust on them. There was even rust on the bags each piece came in. This is concerning considering it’s a bathroom shelf and there will be moisture, I don’t want it rusting more and quickly. I don’t know if there is a way to get the rusted pieces replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Nice for small bathrooms storage
customer_reviews.text: I only wish there was a lip on the front to prevent accidental drops. But it works great and gives our small bathroom more storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, durable and easy to assemble. Unfortunately, it did not fit my space - the dimensions in the description were clear and correct; I was just hoping I could make it work but I couldn't. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crooked shelves
customer_reviews.text: It came looking just as I expected from the Amazon page, except when we installed it we found that the shelves were made crooked. We couldn’t line the sides up parallel to the wall and have the shelves be straight at the same time, so we had to compromise on what we chose to have look straight. It does hold all of our stuff though, so other than the poor manufacturing it does do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Boud Winder

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic wall organizer/shelf. It was relatively easy to put together and install. It is of decent size, but not really big enough for full sized bath towels. For my use, it will be more decorative. Now I just need to figure out what I'm going to put on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna P. Stirman

customer_reviews.title: worked just fine. Looks nice in the bath room
customer_reviews.text: No problem with the shelf, worked just fine. Looks nice in the bath room.
customer_reviews.author: Von Bol

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and  sturdy
customer_reviews.text: But it wasn’t as easy to set up as I expected. When I was done setting it up though, I appreciated the simplicity and practicality of it. Good buy for that price. I found similar items in other websites and they cost a lot more. Thanks seller
customer_reviews.author: Topaz

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this to hang over the toilet in my bathroom to hold extra supplies. Super easy to install and seems very sturdy so far! I ended up buying a second one for my other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: good buy for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a towel rack in my small apartment. Easy to assemble and attach to wall. Seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little shelf
customer_reviews.text: Hung this in my bathroom in about 5 minutes. Holds a good amount of weight! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Cook

customer_reviews.title: ... and takes up a lot of space but it's nice, easy to assemble and fairly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than you think it is and takes up a lot of space but it's nice, easy to assemble and fairly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: keri forster

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelf for bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shelf and easily assembled and installed. Used it in a small master bathroom. It has small metal tubes for shelves, so it is not meant to hold small objects like perfume bottles or nail clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B Zupick

customer_reviews.title: Good qualities
customer_reviews.text: Good size for over the toilet. Easy to assemble. I a senior lady did it myself because the instructions were so clear and complete. Believe me, I don't assemble much.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly  2 to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy for one person to asemble but takes two intall. Looks great in my small bathroom
customer_reviews.author: LILMARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality great storage
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for towels in our bathroom and love it! I want another one! It’s great on a counter top or hung on the wall like ours
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A little tough to hang quickly
customer_reviews.text: Hanging was a little difficult, might have been my wall but it needed extra reinforcements to keep it feeling secure but it's up and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product in my bathroom. It fits the area well and so far is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.author: P. F. Navas

customer_reviews.title: Great for half-bath
customer_reviews.text: We've had this shelf unit for a couple of weeks now, and it's perfect for our small half-bath. Easy assembly, easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Birtz

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install and works great looks beautiful. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Needed something smaller to replace a large bulky cabinet. Just the right size. Love the extra towel bar. Super easy to assemble and install. Approx. 8.5 inches between the 2 shelves allows for some taller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: WJo Hov

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time with all the components. Easy assembly and installation. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Thisuldo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Can’t put it up on the wall, need studs to put up. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: If you need a little extra shelving unit for the bathroom.. this is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. They installed it and said it took about 10 mins. Looks nice and looks more expensive than it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelf
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and install. Great little shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great price, works for me purpose
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I thought when I ordered. Came on time, and does the job
customer_reviews.author: Penny hinders

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price awesome product. Easy to assemble and works great in my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my new cabinet, very easy to install and great space saver. Replaced an old towel rack in the bathroom. We put it over the toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nefer Persona

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item. I wanted it to fit on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. I wanted it to fit on the back of my toilet but it was too wide. Solved the problem with heavy duty Command hooks!
customer_reviews.author: winelady

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I hung this over my mirror in the restroom and use it to hold my hot hair tools, brushes and so on. It's really great! Looks really nice and is super sturdy and fits alot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed at the quality for the cost of this! It’s perfect for my bathroom and was very easy to assemble and install. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: newmom42

customer_reviews.title: with how easy they were to put together
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting much out of these, got pleasantly suprised, with how easy they were to put together, and hang. Ordered two, they came on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Extra storage rack in the shower is exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremie moe

customer_reviews.title: Very durable shelf
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy, easy to install esp for a noob like me. Looks awesome. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: mellow

customer_reviews.title: Take you time assembling it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because I can put most of my things on it.
customer_reviews.author: antionette

customer_reviews.title: I bought two! Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one each for the two bathrooms in my house. It's simple but I like it, especially for the price. It does the job!
customer_reviews.author: H. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Functionality and style!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift...the receiving party loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Fits my need
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together myself (22 yo chick) and hang. Keeps my clutter off the counter and a wide rack to hang a couple hand towels. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Weight Wall Stsnd
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight bathroom wall stand it nickel color just big enough to filled wall space without taking up to much room I recommend if you need something small and light weight. I recommend please see pictures
customer_reviews.author: CLCR

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product for such a low priced item
customer_reviews.author: Hira Salman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for items I use frequently. Looks and fits great over the toilet and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Good price and can save some room for the bath room.
customer_reviews.text: Good price and can save some room for the bath room.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: They go together easily and provide great shelf space for any bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these, one bronze and other nickel. They go together easily and provide great shelf space for any bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Grant D Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fits the spot
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small bath and this fits the space well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with pieces misses. We were unable to install the bottom bar because several bolts were missing, we had 13 instead of 14. And 1 of the 13 wasnt the correct size. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Francis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love this. So easy to assemble and looks great. I bought ti store towels on, and it works good for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to install in a rental unit bathroom. Tenant was very happy with it. It’s aesthetically pleasing and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Liliane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We have a small half bath with nowhere to sit anything, so this was a perfect way to add some extra storage! Easy to assemble and came with drywall anchors as well!
customer_reviews.author: Isis Woltz

customer_reviews.title: This shelf was easy to assemble and looks great in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was easy to assemble and looks great in my bathroom. It is sturdy enough to hold several items.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Puller

customer_reviews.title: Good little shelf
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Don't lose the hardware, it comes with just enough mount it
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: very good quality and fit perfectly the need picture as described
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: I love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf. I bought trays to put on them so items dont fall through. It really looks great
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Can hold heavy products. Very sturdy. Love it
customer_reviews.author: nuwan

customer_reviews.title: great for holding items in bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size and very sturdy. Saving a lot of space on my countertop

product_meta.title: Creative Bath Products Complete Collection 2 Shelf Wall Organizer with Towel Bar, Pearl Nickel finish
